## Locate new sources of data
There is a large amount of available data which is yet to be included this in repository. Please add suggestions for new data sources to the following [Github Issue](https://github.com/thohan88/covid19-nor-data/issues/1).

## Add additional data

### Manually gather historic data
We are missing death figures and historic case figures at municipality and district-level before the 25th of March. If you are able to contribute with these numbers, you could add it to the files in the following [Git-folder](https://github.com/thohan88/covid19-nor-data/tree/master/data/99_help_wanted). Every region counts!

### Scripts for automated data extraction
Ideally, data in this repository should be automatically updated to avoid dependencies of individuals. If you are able to contribute R or Python-scripts which allow for automatic updates of new data sources, that's awesome. Add a pull request to the [Git-repository](https://github.com/thohan88/covid19-nor-data/) or get in touch.

## Contribute with your own data
If you are an organiation willing to contribute with your own data - fantastic. Add a pull request to the [Git-repository](https://github.com/thohan88/covid19-nor-data/) or get in touch.
